about_the_game:
Play as a physionomist determined to climb the social ladder of this world. Face the dangers of the nightlife, get work contracts increasingly risky, build a reputation with clubs, develop your skills and buy equipment to give yourself a brighter future.

Control

Decide who gets in the club and who doesn't. Analyse customers to find out if they are sober, unarmed and of legal age. See if they have suspicious white marks on their nose which can prove drug use, or if they have a specific tattoo on their body. Talk to them to validate your assumptions and reject them if they are confirmed.

Discriminate

Each club will give you clear instructions on the customers they want inside. These criteria may not align with your personal values, but you are paid to apply them. Their demands can be harsh such as favouring a specific social class, ethnic group or gender identity. When you'll have more money and a better reputation, you will be able to avoid taking those contracts.

Stay in alert

Customers may take badly a rejection to the point of becoming violent. They can be frontal and attempt to surround you to beat you up. But sometimes they'll be more vicious by setting up ambushes or drive-bys. So stay in alert at all times, especially when your shift is over.

Defend yourself

When your life is in danger, pulling out your gun will be enough to scare them, but sometimes, you'll have to use it. Just remember, weapons frighten customers. Use them cautiously to not ruin the party and avoid giving your bosses a wrong impression.

Save money

At the end of each mission, you'll have to choose wisely which expenses to cover such as the rent, heating, groceries, ... Try to put as much money aside as possible to cover unexpected events, and to buy some useful stuff in the market such as a gym membership to be stronger, or some boxing lessons to unlock new fight moves.
